6.26.17  12:32 pm   i find your goals a bit mysterious. basically, from what you let on here, you want to create as much as possible before you die. just constant creation of your stuff. but, interestingly, you even consider other types of creation to be obstacles in the way of your other creations. so you say things like "i'd make more of X but then I have to make less of Y". what are your motives here exactly?

     you do realize you've already made 10 albums worth of stuff? do you wanna be Zappa?

     I guess Zappa is good. do you have more mainstream aspirations like releasing albums,

     touring, interviews?

      i think it wouldn't be unwise to take some time to try to work on those things. expanding your influence, expanding your experience. doing this and then doing that other thing. your music and work would probably benefit from something like that.

6.26.17  12:02 pm   Do you feel like the line "damn it seems like writing songs is a lot like being in prison and I realize that the only one who put me there is me" from the song song applies to your post-hotewig life?

     Cause it seems you're pushing yourself to make all this crazy new content at a crazy rate and it's like you're putting yourself back in prison for no other reason than "i wanna do this song or that video asap"
6.26.17  11:18 am   You created your channel in February 19th, 2012 but didn't upload until September 9th, 2013. Why so.

6.26.17  10:40 am   did you know that if you change the dco style you don't have to use the h3 tags anymore? where you have

dco {color:#E9EC54;}

just change it to

dco {
    color:#E9EC54;
    display: block;
    font-size: 20px;
    margin-top: 1em;
    margin-bottom: 1em;
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
    font-weight: bold;
    }

those values are the default browser values for h3, so you can just use dco and it won't mess up the previous questions either
